entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
